name: The Bread Game (Tiradox)
description:
Hi!

The Bread Game (TBG) - This is a fun, meme-based roguelike and clicker game at the same time! I don't know how I did it, but just try to play it!

I allow you to use the auto clicker if you get bored :3

My links:

If you want to support me financially, you can donate to my DonationAlerts - https://www.donationalerts.com/r/tiradox

My Discord server (RU) - https://discord.gg/KTfzw5Gfa5

YouTube (RU - EN) - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbYkR0et7I808CeVeqzCUmA

(The game is VERY buggy. It's funny)

I have many more great ideas for you! Happy gaming and bye!
